page.title: 07Leisure and Recreation
page.content: A sports centre recently opened in the area has encouraged many people to take up sport or join numerous local clubs. They include soccer, hockey, rugby cricket, badminton, volleyball, golf, gymnastics, archery, fishing, tennis, atheletics, judo, karate, solarium, play parks, bingo, snooker, boxing and youth clubs. There is a lot of interest about B.M.X. riding (bicycle riding) in the area although there are no formal facilities for this. A recent craze in the area is roller skating practised mainly by the younger generation.
